ratings.notes: [proposed_contextual_controlled] 1<TAB>5<TAB>5<TAB>4<TAB>4<TAB>Short note: Response is contextually relevant but lacks naturalness in phrasing and could be more comforting to the player's emotional state.
the response shows understanding of the situation and aligns with Elara's healing persona, but could be more specific about natural remedies for dizziness related to swamp spore exposure.
